name: B0P ... Factory Reset
description:
Description

Welcome to B0P ... Factory Reset!

Take control of the lone factory repair bot - B0P, as he journeys to revitalize a run-down factory with the power of Magnetism!

Credits

JasRedStoneWorks - Artwork and Assets

Nightine - Sound Design

Turtike - Programming and Development

Assets Used

Outline Shader - GDQuest and contributors - https://www.gdquest.com/ 

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ "Ambience, Machine Factory, A" - InspectorJ
